channel.title: geodata on Chris Havlin
channel.description: Recent content in geodata on Chris Havlin

item.title: So you want to plot a global geoTIFF in web mercator...
item.description: Need to go from epsg:4326 to web mercator and you’re a bit of a GIS n00b like me?

item.title: A quick primer on volume rendering of geophysics data with yt
item.description: Over the past couple years I’ve worked on volume rendering of 3D geoscience data using yt in a number of ways.

item.title: Speeding up some K-means computation with dask
item.description: I recently dusted off a manuscript that’s been in the works for quite some time now related to seismic observations in the Western United States.
